forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 14C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Abundant sunshine. High 58F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds. Low near 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 19C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 66F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny in the morning then becoming cloudy with periods of rain later in the day. High 16C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny in the morning then becoming cloudy with periods of rain later in the day. High 61F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early. Then becoming foggy. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain giving way to foggy conditions overnight. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High near 15C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 58F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Low clouds and fog. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Foggy. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 13C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 56F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low 43F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 58F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 13C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High around 55F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 4C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low near 40F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning, then sunny in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning, then sunny in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 6C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 43F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 58F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early then becoming cloudy with periods of light rain later at night. Low around 5C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early then becoming cloudy with periods of light rain later at night. Low 42F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 13C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High near 55F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
